paper_abstract: This article determines whether the diameter of a vascular lumen is clinically valuable for hemodialysis therapy. A novel method is proposed that uses a flexible fuzzy classifier implementing a curve approximation function to estimate residual stenosis in an arteriovenous shunt. The auscultation method provides a noninvasive technique for monitoring the degree of arteriovenous shunt stenoses.
paper_title: Estimating Residual Stenosis for an Arteriovenous Shunt Using a Flexible Fuzzy Classifier
